name: Senka Noble - Liu Xuan
desc:
While you control another "Senka" monster, your opponent's monsters cannot target this card for attacks. You can only use each of the following effects of "Senka Noble - Liu Xuan" once per turn.
● If your opponent controls more monsters than you do: You can send 1 card from your hand or field to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Senka" monster from your Deck, except "Senka Noble - Liu Xuan".
● When an attack is declared involving your other "Senka" monster: You can draw 1 card.
